pages.text: Alongside the new enchantments, Tridents may now also receive $(9)Sharpness$(), $(9)Looting$(), and $(9)Piercing$().$(p)Sharpness and Looting function as they do on swords.$(p)Piercing causes thrown tridents to be able to hit additional enemies.

pages.title: Making Tridents
pages.text: .zenith. also adds a method of creating tridents.$(p)Simply create an $(9)Inert Trident$() and upgrade it through $(l:zenith:enchanting/table/infusion)Infusion Enchanting$().
